description:
Description :
        Lydia, the daughter of a count, was on the verge of the downfall of her family after her father was falsely accused of assaulting the princess. However, one day, she suddenly receives news that her father's innocence has been proven. A man named Reyes, a dark magician, has demanded that he clear the stigma of the count's family name as a reward for his achievements. Although Reyes is said to be gloomy and shady, he also has a kind and sincere side, and a shy side that makes it hard to leave people alone. Lydia is gradually drawn to Reyes.????????????????????????????????????????? ???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????? ????????????????????????????????????????????????????? ????????????????????????
